name.title: Service name
name.description: The name of the service instance

user.title: User
user.description: The user that the service will run as.

service_account.description: The service account for DC/OS service authentication. This is typically left empty to use the default unless service authentication is needed. The value given here is passed as the principal of Mesos framework.

service_account_secret.title: Credential secret name (optional)
service_account_secret.description: Name of the Secret Store credentials to use for DC/OS service authentication. This should be left empty unless service authentication is needed.

virtual_network_name.description: The name of the virtual network to join

virtual_network_plugin_labels.description: Labels to pass to the virtual network plugin. Comma-separated key:value pairs. For example: k_0:v_0,k_1:v_1,...,k_n:v_n

log_level.description: The log level for the DC/OS service.

job_url.title: Job URL
job_url.description: URL for the TensorFlow job you want to run on DC/OS (ZIPs are okay).

job_path.title: Job Path (Optional)
job_path.description: Path to your TensorFlow job (assume job_url has already been downloaded/unpacked to the current directory). This path will be added to PYTHONPATH at runtime.

job_name.title: Job Name
job_name.description: Name of the module (without extension) whose main function should be executed.

job_context.title: Job Context (Optional)
job_context.description: A dictionary to pass to your job's main function (intended for run-time configuration options like batch_size, learning_rate, etc.).

shared_filesystem.title: Shared Filesystem
shared_filesystem.description: Distributed TensorFlow relies on a shared filesystem (GCS, HDFS, etc.) for summaries/checkpoints. Please set up one of these filesystems before using this package, and specify the location here (eg. 'gs://your/directory' or 'hdfs://namenode:port/your/directory').

gcs_key.title: GCS Key
gcs_key.description: Stringified contents of JSON key for Google Cloud Storage service account. Only use this field if use_gcs_key_secret is set to False.

use_gcs_key_secret.description: A DC/OS secret called gcs_key exists and should be consumed by this framework.

use_tensorboard.description: Should the framework also launch an instance of Tensorboard? Make sure you have a shared filesystem set up first! You can still run Tensorboard locally if this is set to false

tf_image.title: TensorFlow Docker Image
tf_image.description: Name of the TensorFlow Docker Image in which Worker/PS tasks will be run (usr/img:version).

gpu_tf_image.title: TensorFlow GPU Docker Image
gpu_tf_image.description: Name of the TensorFlow Docker Image in which GPU Worker tasks will be run (usr/img:version).

count.title: Node count
count.description: Number of TF ps tasks to run

placement_constraint.title: Placement constraint
placement_constraint.description: Marathon-style placement constraint for nodes. Example: 'hostname:UNIQUE'

port.title: Port
port.description: The port Parameter Servers will use for gRPC.

disk.title: Disk size (MB)
disk.description: TF PS persistent disk requirements (in MB)

disk_type.title: Disk type [ROOT, MOUNT]
disk_type.description: Mount volumes require preconfiguration in DC/OS

count.title: Node count
count.description: Number of TF Workers to run

placement_constraint.title: Placement constraint
placement_constraint.description: Marathon-style placement constraint for nodes. Example: 'hostname:UNIQUE'

port.title: Port
port.description: The port Workers (and GPU Workers) will use for gRPC.

disk.title: Disk size (MB)
disk.description: TF Worker persistent disk requirements (in MB)

disk_type.title: Disk type [ROOT, MOUNT]
disk_type.description: Mount volumes require preconfiguration in DC/OS

count.title: Node count
count.description: Number of TF GPU Workers to run

mem.title: Memory size (MB)
mem.description: TF GPU Worker mem requirements (in MB)

disk.title: Disk size (MB)
disk.description: TF GPU Worker persistent disk requirements (in MB)

disk_type.title: Disk type [ROOT, MOUNT]
disk_type.description: Mount volumes require preconfiguration in DC/OS

port.title: Port
port.description: The port on which TensorBoard will run.
